Packages 
Package Description
de.humatic.nmj  

nmj API documentation

© 2010-13, Nils Peters,
humatic GmbH,
Berlin, Germany.

version 0_8_8



nmj - Network MIDI for desktop Java - provides various forms of network MIDI functionality to J2SE applications. With the release of the mnet driver the desktop version of this library is now officially deprecated and no longer under development. New features added to version 0_8_9 of the Android branch are missing and only have counterparts in the native Windows and OS X implementations. This leaves Linux behind for the moment, but instead of maintaining two increasingly different java apis, it seems to make more sense to focus on creating a native Linux implementation as well.
Desktop applications can also use this library via javax.sound.midi. Drop it onto the classpath and defined channels will become available as javax.sound.MIDIDevices.
